Author: paperklipp
Text: I get this all the time from restricting.   Ymmv, but my main tool for combating it is that on days when I’ve eaten (I have a “refeeding” weekend once or twice a month) and I have the energy and clarity of mind, I make detailed To Do Lists for every day until my next refeeding weekend. Everything I have to do at home, all my work projects and every single step involved, all of my appointments, all in the order I have to do them in. Then each day when I wake up I open the list for that day and check off each thing as I do it. From the outside I look like the most organised and put-together person on the planet haha. I never forget to do anything. In reality everything is haze.
